name: Ninja Platformer Demo
description:
Your homeland has been invaded by zombies! Defeat them and fight for your home in this 2D Ninja vs Zombies platformer!

***Controller does not work as of April 11, 2023**

**Be weary of you volume, you may want to turn it down a bit as the background music is slightly louder than intended**

**This game is currently a demo and I plan on adding more levels, fixing any bugs issues, as well as controller support in the future!***

Special thanks to SOLOQ for assets!
